desc: Help save a pets life by shopping at Foster Army Animal Rescue's Online Thrift Store

layout.text:
Welcome to our Thrift Store's Online Store.  During the COVID-19 shutdown, we created this space for our loyal customers in an effort to support our life saving work.  100% of your online purchase goes towards saving animal's lives.
Because we care, facemasks will be optional for shoppers and volunteers.  With cooperation, respect, and kindness, together we can create a safe place while we slowly get back to normal.
